name: Soltari Guerrillas
originalText:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
{0}: The next time Soltari Guerrillas would deal combat damage to an opponent this turn, it deals that damage to target creature instead.

rulings.text: Regardless of when the ability is activated, it will apply to the defending player at the time Soltari Guerrillas tries to deal combat damage to them.
